title: Watch our live video show Thursday night
text:
Watch: Join Washington Post anchor Libby Casey for pre- and post-debate analysis. Post reporters Ashley Parker, Cleve Wootson, Joyce Koh, Amber Phillips, Eugene Scott and David Weigel discuss the stakes, the personalities and the policy contrasts in the race for the White House. Tune in starting at 7:30 p.m. Eastern and stay with us after the debate for The Fix’s winners and losers.

Read: We’ll be bringing you updates and analysis here and on washingtonpost.com.

Sign up: Get The Trailer newsletter, with special pre- and post-debate editions this week.
description: Watch: Join Washington Post anchor Libby Casey for pre- and post-debate analysis. Post reporters Ashley Parker, Cleve Wootson, Joyce Koh, Amber Phillips, Eugene Scott and David Weigel discuss the stakes, the personalities and the policy contrasts in the race for the White House.  Tune in starting at 7:30 p.m. Eastern and stay with us after the debate for The Fix’s winners and losers.
